scripts.fetch-all: node fetch-bls-laus.js && node fetch-bls-ces.js && node fetch-census.js && node fetch-bea.js
scripts.fetch-new: npm run fetch-bls-cpi && npm run fetch-bls-jolts && npm run fetch-bls-projections
scripts.process-new: npm run process-cpi && npm run process-jolts && npm run process-projections && npm run process-ticker
scripts.generate: node generate-state-files.js && node generate-metro-data.js && node generate-national-counties.js
scripts.all: npm run fetch-all && npm run fetch-new && npm run fetch-oews && npm run generate && npm run process-new && npm run build-search
